projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Rock Paper Sissors App
projects.bodyText: - An application that allows the user to play against a computer in Rock Paper Sissors where the computer output is randomized

projects.title: Periodic Word Output
projects.bodyText: - An app that allows one to input a word or phrase and output corrisponding elements for each letter of the input

projects.title: Mechanical Engineering Solar Concentrator
projects.bodyText:
- A NASA sponsored event in which I helped design and prototype a solar concentrator to power equipment for the Artemis Mission that would take place on the moon.
 - Voted as best peered review project of TSGC {Texas Space Grant Consortium} of the year 2022

projects.title: Fuel Cell Hydrogen Input Calibration
projects.bodyText: - Used data on fuel cell power generation to determine efficient hydrogen input into the system. Azure was used for cloud computation on the thermal fluid system.

projects.title: Generator Rotor Extractor
projects.bodyText: - Designed a system in which a turbine rotor of over 60 tons can be extracted from its stator unit safely with minimal risk of damage for maintenance
